metadata.title: CVE-2016-4056 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in the Backend component in TYPO36.2.x before 6.2.19 allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web scriptor HTML via the module parameter when creating a bookmark.

criterions.comment: typo3-src: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
